PTHREAD_YIELD_NP(3) Library Functions Manual PTHREAD_YIELD_NP(3)

NAME

pthread_yield_np —
yield control of the current thread

SYNOPSIS

#include <pthread.h>

void
pthread_yield_np(void);

DESCRIPTION

The pthread_yield() causes the running thread to relinquish the processor.
September 18, 2006 Mac OS X 11.0
